New Records: Jalen Green scored 22 of his 29 points in the third quarter and led the Rockets to a 135-112 victory over the Wizards.
The Rockets improved to 6-1 on the road against Eastern Conference opponents.
Corey Kispert scored 23 points and Jonas Valanciunas added 18 for the Wizards.
Key Match Events: The Rockets overcame a 20-point first quarter deficit.
Jalen Green's strong performance in the third quarter was a turning point.
Pre-Game Insights: The Rockets were focused on their perimeter defense and key player matchups.
Post-Match Reflections: The Rockets' improving road record was highlighted after the win.
The Wizards faced a tough loss with their third straight defeat.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rockets dominated the Wizards on the glass with 59 rebounds to 42.
